title: Protein structure and functions
brief_description: The film shows that life requires protein as a structure to maintain it and as a catalyst for the system of chemical reactions necessary for life. Shows the molecular structure of protein and its function. Presents protein as a polymer of amino acids and shows that amino acid side chains determine the structural configuration and chemical or enzymatic activity of protein.
